title: Workforce Readiness Act of 1993
content: Workforce Readiness Act of 1993 - Title I: National Board on Workforce Skills - Establishes a National Board on Workforce Skills for the 21st Century. Title II: School-to-Work Transition Programs - Authorizes the Secretary of Education to make grants to local educational agencies to develop, implement, or expand programs which integrate workplace skills into the regular school curriculum to facilitate the transition from school to work. Sets forth reporting requirements. Authorizes appropriations for such grants and for the National Board.
